id.description: The unique identifier of the webhook

direct_link.description: A direct link to access detailed information about the webhook

created_at.description: The date and time when the webhook was created

url.description: The URL where the webhook sends its payload upon triggering

active.description: Indicates whether the webhook is currently active or not

token.description: A security token used to authenticate requests to the webhook

events.description: An array of events that the webhook is listening to
